actions to correct assessment findings and develop supporting plan of action and milestone POAM reports and update System Security Plan Leads the team to conduct KickOff Meetings with the system document the findings and observation discovered during an assessment Request and Review Vulnerability Scans and Reports and recommend corrective actions to address identified vulnerabilities Provide advise base on corporate standards external legislation and general best practice to safely guide the organization passed the pit falls of cyber threats Ensure security assessment are completed for each Information System CYBER SECURITY COMPLIANCE ANALYST TENET HEALTH February 2013 to October 2015 Assisted in the development of an Information Security Continuous Monitoring Strategy to help organization in maintaining an ongoing awareness of information security Developed and conducted STE Security Test and Evaluation according to NIST SP 80053A Conducted a security control assessment to assess the adequacy of management operational privacy and technical security controls implemented Assisted in the development of Privacy Threshold Analysis PTA and Privacy Impact Analysis PIA by working closely with the Information System Security Officer ISSO the System Owner the Information Owners and the Privacy Act Officer Developed an EAuthentication report to provide technical guidance in the implementation of electronic authentication eauthentication IT COMPLIANCE ANALYST Brown Brothers Harriman January 2010 to February 2013 Assisted in the development of Privacy Threshold Analysis EAuthentication report to provide technical guidance in the implementation of electronic authentication eauthentication Assisted with the development of a system security plan SSP to provide an overview of federal information system security requirements and describe the controls in place Conducted meetings with the IT client team to gather evidence developed test plans testing procedures and documented test results and exceptions Conducted walkthroughs formulated test plans documented gaps test results and exceptions and developed remediation plans for each area of testing Performed gaps developed remediation plans and presented final results to the IT Management team Initiated and lead information security awareness and training programs Education MASTERS INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
